content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column top_margin=”page-margin-top”][vc_text_separator title=”Home & Office Cleaning Services” color=”custom” accent_color=”#397fd4″ el_id=”levelsep”][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

We operate in Cambridge, Boston, Brookline, Newton, Somerville,Watertown, Rhode Island, and surrounding areas. Our residential and commercial services are separated by tiers to fit your needs, and you can schedulethe frequency of your home or office cleanings. You can request a quote here!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row top_margin=”page-margin-top” equal_height=”yes”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” width=”1/3″]

    • Weekly

      The Weekly can be either deep or basic, you choose. For people with a different preference, the weekly package allows you to pick either if you need highly help with the cleaning or just maintenance mixed with other house chores that you preferer us to do.

[/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” width=”1/3″]

    • Bi-Weekly

      The Bi-Weekly can be either deep or basic, you choose. It is the most common since people be outdoor most of their daytime but still need that cleaning push every other week. After two weeks housekeeping chores can become a little stressful. We for you to help either if highly cleaning is needed or just regular maintenance with a mix of preference, you choose.

[/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” width=”1/3″]

    • Monthly

      Monthly can be either deep or basic, you choose. A type, that does not require as much cleaning, perhaps is not many people at home or someone follow up with the cleaning and just need assistance at one point during the month. It makes a difference when more attention is shown to your home. You pick the type of cleaning that better fits your home.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row top_margin=”page-margin-top”][vc_column][vc_text_separator title=”Levels of Service” color=”custom” accent_color=”#397fd4″ el_id=”levelsep”][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes”][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” width=”1/3″]

    • Basic Cleaning

      Basic cleaning is the simplest housekeeping chores where people will still feel the joy of a fresh cleaned home. To better serve you in basic cleaning other housekeeping chores can be added as needed.

[/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” width=”1/3″]

    • Deep Cleaning

      Deep cleaning is much more detailed cleaning. There is more scrubbing, reaching under and behind home appliances and furniture if possible. Your entire home will be dust free, profound disinfectant and all built-up dirt removed. Our standard size is the following common areas kitchen, dining room, living room bathrooms, and the selected amount of bedrooms.

[/vc_column][vc_column css_animation=”fadeInUp” width=”1/3″]

    • Moving In-Out

      Excited about your new place but don’t feel like do the cleanings. Don’t worry we can help by taking care of the that, including left behind garbage. Or getting the property scrubbed and dusted free place for the next people that are moving in. Ideal for realtors.

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes”][vc_column top_margin=”page-margin-top”][vc_text_separator title=”Additional Services” color=”custom” accent_color=”#397fd4″ el_id=”levelsep”][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row disable_element=”yes”][vc_column css_animation=”bounceInUp” width=”1/3″ el_id=”additionalserv”][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full-width” el_class=”padding-top-59 padding-bottom-60 align-center”][vc_column]

SEE OUR PRICES AND BOOK TODAY!Request Services

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator align=”align_left”][/vc_column][/vc_row]

You can request a quote here!
